title: SRI LANKA HAS TO ACT PATIENTLY, BUT STERN IN DIPLOMACY
content: Onlanka News – By Noor Nizam – Canada The Sri Lankan High Commissioner to India HE. Prasad Kariyawasam has blamed  “fringe pro-LTTE groups” in the state of Tamil Nadu for the violence against visiting Sri Lankans, but underlined it will not affect robust ties or the visit of President Mahinda Rajapaksa to India later this…
